outcomes: Integrated new feature into existing environment that has since serviced over 70,000 customers
Improved test coverage over multiple repositories
Increased knowledge of GoLang within team from nil to proficient for all team members using TDD
Transitioned backend microservice to Adapter pattern, simplifying the code base, reducing repeated code and improving the test coverage
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining software for business critical (crown jewel) systems, servicing nearly 10 million customers
Developing and maintaining APIs for both support and feature production as per stakeholder requirements
Facilitating code katas to improve the teams overall backend language skills, tackle new feature development and improve ways of working
Configuring CI/CD pipelines for new and existing microservices
Writing unit, integration and end to end tests
content.description: The 25 microservices that comprise the MyAccount dashboard are built using NextJS and GoLang and service over 10 million customers. The primary work on this project is developing new service features, maintaining and uplifting the code bases and creating and optimising tests.
